channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 in Alberta Schools Charts See Support our Students Alberta for the complete list of schools with Covid-19 cases.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current numbers of outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 50 Edmonton Zone 24 South Zone 15 Central Zone 11 North Zone 24 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Tue, Apr 06, 2021. AHS data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Active VOC cases 5457 VOC Percentage 44.8% Total VOC cases 8278 Total VOC recovered 2791 Total deaths from VOC 30 VOC specimens screened 24059 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Wed, Apr 07, 2021 Variants of Concern Charts Alberta Health Services and the Government of Alberta Covid-19 tracker began providing active VOC cases by AHS Zone on Mar 29.
